import{useEffect,useState}from'react';// Returns true if user requests reduced motion
export function usePrefersReducedMotion(){const[reduced,setReduced]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const mq=window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)');const update=()=>setReduced(mq.matches);update();mq.addEventListener?mq.addEventListener('change',update):mq.addListener(update);return()=>{mq.removeEventListener?mq.removeEventListener('change',update):mq.removeListener(update);};},[]);return reduced;}
